disclaimer.title: About Our Data
disclaimer.message: All costs are based on real travel experience and verified sources. Prices may vary by season, demand, and exchange rates.

calculator.estimate: * Estimates based on real traveler experience. Actual costs may vary.
calculator.pricesPerPerson: All prices are per person, per day

form.namePlaceholderFood: e.g., Breakfast at Cafe, Dinner at Restaurant
form.namePlaceholderTransport: e.g., Uber to Airport, Metro Day Pass

calculator.soloTraveler: For solo travelers with light luggage, public transport is the most economical choice.
calculator.groupTraveler: For groups of 3+, a taxi or Uber becomes competitive when splitting the cost.
calculator.heavyLuggage: With multiple bags, consider taxi/Uber for comfort and convenience.
calculator.generalRecommendation: Public transport offers the best value. Taxi/Uber if you prioritize comfort.
calculator.fastFrequent: Fast, frequent, good with light luggage
calculator.doorToDoor: Door to door, good for 1-4 people
calculator.bookInApp: Book in app, usually cheaper than taxi

about.title: About TripCalc
about.mission: TripCalc was created to answer a simple question most travel websites can't: How much does a trip really cost?

difference.title: Why TripCalc?
difference.description: Most travel sites focus on inspiration, hotels, and attractions. TripCalc focuses on something more practical: real-world numbers, real traveler decisions, and real costs — based on experience, not generic averages.

realExperience.title: Built from Real Experience
realExperience.description: TripCalc is not a generic travel blog. It's built using:

points.3: Real-world testing of transport, ATMs, SIMs, and daily expenses
points.4: Data collected and refined over time

whatYouCanDo.title: What You Can Do with TripCalc

points.1: Estimate the real daily cost of a trip
points.2: Compare transportation options with real prices
points.4: Understand tips, fees, and hidden costs
points.6: Make smarter budgeting decisions before and during a trip

community.title: Growing with the Community
community.description: TripCalc is designed to grow gradually:

points.1: Starting with a few cities and core calculators
points.2: Expanding with better data over time

about.finalMessage: TripCalc helps you plan with confidence by turning travel into numbers you can actually use.

footer.tagline: Because travelers deserve tools, not just inspiration.

cta.title: Plan Your Next Trip
cta.subtitle: Explore real costs for cities around the world and travel with confidence.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to TripCalc. By using our service, you agree to these terms.

section1.title: 1. Data Privacy
section1.p1: We will never sell or share your personal data with third parties for marketing purposes.
section1.p2: Your email is only used for authentication and essential service communications.
section1.p3: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information.

section2.title: 2. Use of Your Data
section2.p1: Trip data (budgets, expenses, custom items) is used to:

list.item1: Provide calculator functionality and trip planning features
list.item2: Generate anonymous statistics to help future travelers
list.item3: Improve price accuracy through data normalization

section2.p2: All aggregated data is anonymized and cannot be traced back to individual users.

section3.title: 3. Price Accuracy Disclaimer
section3.p1: While we strive for accuracy, travel costs displayed on TripCalc:

list.item1: May contain errors or be outdated
list.item2: Vary by season, demand, and exchange rates
list.item3: Are based on personal experience and user-submitted data
list.item4: Should be verified before making travel decisions

section3.p2: Prices are estimates and guidelines, not guarantees.

section4.title: 4. Limitation of Liability
section4.p1: TripCalc provides travel cost information as a guide only.

list.item1: Decisions made based on our data
list.item2: Financial losses due to inaccurate information
list.item3: Changes in prices or travel conditions
list.item4: Issues arising from trip planning based on our tools

section4.p3: You are solely responsible for verifying all information and making your own travel decisions.

section5.title: 5. User-Generated Content
section5.p1: By submitting custom items, expenses, or feedback, you grant TripCalc the right to:

list.item1: Use the data to improve the service
list.item3: Share aggregated insights with the community

section5.p2: You retain ownership of your data and can delete it at any time.

list.item1: Scrape or automatically extract data from the site
list.item3: Abuse the service or interfere with other users
list.item4: Use the service for any illegal purpose

section7.title: 7. Intellectual Property
section7.p1: All content, design, code, and data on TripCalc is owned by TripCalc or its licensors.
section7.p2: You may not copy, modify, or distribute our content without permission.

section8.title: 8. Account Termination
section8.p1: You may delete your account at any time, which will remove all your personal data.
section8.p2: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms.

section9.title: 9. Changes to Terms
section9.p1: We may update these terms from time to time.
section9.p2: Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
section9.p3: We will notify users of significant changes via email or site notification.

section10.title: 10. Contact & Support
section10.p1: For questions, errors, or feedback, contact us at:
section10.p2: We welcome your suggestions and will do our best to respond promptly.

section11.title: 11. Governing Law
section11.p1: These terms are governed by the laws of Republic of Chile.
section11.p2: Any disputes will be resolved in the courts of Republic of Chile.

terms.acceptance: By using TripCalc, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to these Terms of Service.

admin.manageUsers: Manage users and their premium status
admin.confirmAdminChange: Are you sure you want to change admin status for this user?

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how TripCalc collects, uses, and protects your information.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.p1: We collect information you provide directly:

list.item4: Respond to your questions and support requests

section3.title: 3. Data Sharing
section3.p1: We do not sell your personal data.
section3.p2: We may share anonymized, aggregated data with the community to help travelers.
section3.p3: We may share data with service providers (hosting, authentication) under strict confidentiality.

section4.title: 4. Data Security
section4.p1: We use industry-standard security measures to protect your data.
section4.p3: Passwords are hashed and never stored in plain text.

section5.title: 5. Your Rights (GDPR)
section5.p1: If you are in the EU, you have the right to:

list.item3: Delete your data ('right to be forgotten')
list.item4: Export your data in a portable format
list.item5: Opt out of data processing for analytics

section6.title: 6. Cookies & Analytics
section6.p1: We use essential cookies for authentication and session management.
section6.p2: We may use analytics tools (Google Analytics, Vercel Analytics) to understand usage patterns.
section6.p3: You can disable cookies in your browser settings.

section7.title: 7. Data Retention
section7.p1: We retain your data as long as your account is active.
section7.p2: When you delete your account, your personal data is permanently removed.
section7.p3: Anonymized statistics may be retained indefinitely.

section8.title: 8. Children's Privacy
section8.p1: TripCalc is not intended for users under 13 years of age.
section8.p2: We do not knowingly collect data from children.

section9.title: 9. Changes to Privacy Policy
section9.p1: We may update this policy from time to time.
section9.p2: We will notify you of significant changes.

section10.title: 10. Contact
section10.p1: For privacy-related questions, contact us at:

premium.unlocked: You have access to all premium features

dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
dangerZone.deleteWarning: This will permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.
